name: Aunt Johnnie's Pound Cake
author: Jean Higginbotham
summary: This is a moist, very flavorful pound cake. Absolutely wonderful plain or served with strawberries and whipped cream.
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Lightly grease and flour a 10 inch Bundt pan
Cream shortening, butter and sugar until light and fluffy (for best results use an electric mixer)
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition
Stir into creamed mixture alternately with the milk, starting and ending with flour
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean
Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely
